item.title: Preparing Hugo to generate a local website
item.description: You need to download and install Hugo, create a new website, and then add a theme. Afterwards, you can generate a local website with Markdown files. Downloading Hugo Navigate to https://gohugo.io/ and click Quick Start. Click the install hyperlink to navigate to the Install Hugo page.

item.title: Preparing GitHub
item.description: You need to create a new repository in GitHub, install Git and configure SSH key in GitHub. Creating a new repository in GitHub Navigate to https://github.com/ to register a new GitHub account. Create a new repository. Note: Your repository name must follow the format as “your-account-name.github.io”. For example, Bunny-Xiangli.

item.title: Building up an online website
item.description:
Follow the instructions to build up a website:

  1. Navigate to the folder which contains your Markdown files (for example, D:\Hugo\bin\DocWeb\content\posts).

  2. Right-click and select Git Bash Here in the drop-down menu.
